thread.title: Though social media is great, the content is the king: Dipna Patel
thread.title_full: Though social media is great, the content is the king: Dipna Patel - The Times of India

author: Shreya Iyer
title: Though social media is great, the content is the king: Dipna Patel
text:
With her debut Gujarati movie, Gujjubhai The Great garnering great reviews and going full house with every show, actress Dipna Patel believes that in the age
of social media, content is and will always be the king .
Divulging more details the pretty actress adds, "With promotions especially on social media becoming an important part of Gujarati cinema, the content is always the
magician. I think social media is a great tool, to promote one's movie, but having said that after a point it's the content that will draw in the maximum audience
and spread a positive word about the movie."
